titleInfo.title: Letter No. 191 of 1827 from John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Territorial Department, to John Bax, Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: Encloses copies of correspondence between the John Weddberburn, the Political Resident at Bushire, and Benjamin Norton, the Assay Master, regarding new Deenars [dinars] issued by the Persian Government.Enclosures include:Letter from the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire to John Wedderburn, dated 17 April 1826 (but given as 1827);Letter from John Wedderburn to Benjamin Norton, Assay Master, dated 15 May 1826;Letter from Benjamin Norton to John Wedderburn, dated 27 May 1826;Letter no. 74 of 1826 from John Wedderburn to Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, dated 13 June 1826;Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus to Jon Wedderburn, dated 20 December 1826;Letter no. 69 of 1827 from John Wedderburn to Benjamin Norton, dated 22 February 1827;Letter from Benjamin Norton to John Wedderburn, dated 4 April 1827.
